name: Dan Adrenaline
body:
### Introduction
As I am now moving forward into the Information Systems domain I would like to start sharing code, sites and opinions on items that I discover, this will be where you can find them!

### New Job
I am moving from a role as a Application Developer working on C#, HTML and JS projects into a dynamic support and development role with an amazing company called **BrightStarr**, I hope that the role will bring me lots of knowledge that I can use to further my developments and share reusable code right here on GitHub.

### Projects
* Currently I am privately working on a Xamarin Forms project for a cross-platform application prototype

_As the prototype progresses and as the details are ironed out some or all of the reusable code base will be published._

### Authors and Contributors
At the moment it is just me working on the prototype, hopefully momentum will gain and we will be able to reach out for further support in Xamarin and Back-end work.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
